channel.title: MCP on Camilo Rojas
channel.description: Recent content in MCP on Camilo Rojas

item.title: Convergence of market segments around AI
item.description: Chatbots, intelligent process automation, and generative AI are converging into an AI Agents stack. Here’s what’s driving the shift, who’s involved, and how to evaluate investments through a generative lens.

item.title: AI Catalogs: The Next Governance Artifact
item.description: Why AI catalogs are becoming the core enterprise artifact connecting gateways, governance, and security—plus a pragmatic path to get started.

item.title: The Evolution of AI Agent Development: From Complex Engineering to Accessible Tools
item.description: Exploring how AI agent development has evolved from requiring deep technical expertise to accessible no-code platforms, the emergence of domain-specific agents, and the critical role of industry standards in fostering innovation.

item.title: Generative AI: Understanding Encoding, Decoding, or Encoding/Decoding style models
item.description: Second episode of AI for Business — standards, governance, and how gateways connect runtime policy with agent experiences.
